text: @toryboypierce @COVID19 @MattHancock You seem so sad @toryboypierce that the government has done something you said was impossible! Whose got egg on their face. I would suggest that you were so far wrong with your assessments and innuendo, that perhaps you should consider resigning yourself. Pompous twat
